 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָוָה‎</span>] **verb** ==wait for== (probably originally ***twist, stretch***, then of ***tension*** of enduring, waiting: Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡ûû***</u></abbr> II, I. ***wait***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡û***</u></abbr>, ***cord***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be strong***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strength***, also ***strand*** of rope; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***endure, remain, await***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***threads***, so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוִּין‎</span> spider's ***threads, web***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** plural ***those waiting for*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>): construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֵי י‎</span> [[Ps.37.9|Ps 37:9]] so [[Isa.40.31|Isa 40:31]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]], and [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺיֵי‎</span>); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִוָ֑י‎</span> [[Isa.49.23|Isa 49:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹוֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.25.3|Ps 25:3]]; [[Ps.69.7|Ps 69:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִוָיו‎</span> [[Lam.3.35|Lam 3:35]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוו‎</span>, i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹווֺ‎</span>). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִוְּתָה‎</span> [[Ps.130.5|Ps 130:5]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִוִּיתִי‎</span> [[Gen.49.18|Gen 49:18]] + 5 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִוֵּיתִי‎</span> [[Isa.5.4|Isa 5:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְק‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.8.17|Isa 8:17]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִוִּיתִיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.25.21|Ps 25:21]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִוּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.56.7|Ps 56:7]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקַוֶּה‎</span> [[Mic.5.6|Mic 5:6]]; [[Job.7.2|Job 7:2]], jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקַו‎</span> [[Job.3.9|Job 3:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְקַו‎</span> [[Isa.5.2|Isa 5:2]]; [[Isa.5.7|Isa 5:7]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוֵּה‎</span> [[Hos.12.7|Hos 12:7]] +; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוֺה‎</span> [[Ps.40.2|Ps 40:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַוֵּה‎</span> [[Jer.8.15|Jer 8:15]]; [[Jer.14.19|Jer 14:19]] — 

**1.** ***wait***, or ***look eagerly, for***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing [[Isa.5.7|Isa 5:7]]; [[Isa.59.9|Isa 59:9]]; [[Isa.59.11|Isa 59:11]]; [[Jer.8.15|Jer 8:15]]; [[Jer.13.16|Jer 13:16]]; [[Jer.14.19|Jer 14:19]]; [[Job.3.9|Job 3:9]]; [[Job.6.19|Job 6:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִישׁוּעָֽתְךָ‎</span> [[Gen.49.18|Gen 49:18]] with accusative of thing [[Lam.2.16|Lam 2:16]] (suffix), [[Job.7.2|Job 7:2]]; [[Job.30.26|Job 30:26]]; [[Ps.39.8|Ps 39:8]] object of thing omitted [[Isa.64.2|Isa 64:2]] followed by infinitive [[Isa.5.2|Isa 5:2]]; [[Isa.5.4|Isa 5:4]]; [[Ps.69.21|Ps 69:21]] absolute [[Job.17.13|Job 17:13]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.26.8|Isa 26:8]] (suffix), [[Ps.25.5|Ps 25:5]]; [[Ps.25.21|Ps 25:21]] (suffix), [[Ps.40.2|Ps 40:2]] (+ infinitive absolute), [[Ps.130.5|Ps 130:5]], accusative omitted v[[Ps.130.5|Ps 130:5]], accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁמְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.52.11|Ps 52:11]] (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲחַוֶּה‎</span>, [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוה‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.8.17|Isa 8:17]]; [[Isa.25.9|Isa 25:9]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.33.2|Isa 33:2]]; [[Isa.60.9|Isa 60:9]] (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיִּים יִקָּווּ‎</span> ***ships shall gather*** (II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוה‎</span>), so [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di-Kit]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]], compare Skinner (also [[BDB#Luz|Luzz]] [[BDB#Gei|Gei]] [[BDB#Oort|Oort]]), [[Jer.14.22|Jer 14:22]]; [[Prov.20.22|Prov 20:22]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלאֱֿלֹהִים‎</span> [[Hos.12.7|Hos 12:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליֿ‎</span> [[Isa.51.5|Isa 51:5]]; [[Ps.27.14|Ps 27:14]] (twice in verse); [[Ps.37.34|Ps 37:34]]. 

**2.** ***lie in wait for***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשִׁי‎</span> [[Ps.56.7|Ps 56:7]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Ps.119.95|Ps 119:95]] (+ infinitive purpose). 

**3.** ***wait*** (linger) ***for*** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of man [[Mic.5.6|Mic 5:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְיַחֵל‎</span>). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָוָה‎</span>] **verb** ==collect== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***collect***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***be collected, Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִקְווּ‎</span> consecutive [[Jer.3.17|Jer 3:17]] (of nations); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּווּ‎</span> [[Gen.1.9|Gen 1:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; of waters; both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location); so probably of ships (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person) [[Isa.60.9|Isa 60:9]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְקַוּוּ‎</span>), see I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קזה‎</span> 

**Pi\`el 1.**
